title: Using `tinytiger`
text: tinytiger methods download TIGER shapes Census geographies. full list available tinytiger website. download shapes, can use corresponding function geography. functions prefixed tt_. counties, example, can run: options downloads : tt_address_ranges() tt_ai_an_nh_areas() tt_anrc() tt_area_landmarks() tt_area_water() tt_block_groups() tt_blocks() tt_cbsa() tt_coastline() tt_congressional_districts() tt_consolidated_cities() tt_counties() tt_county_subdivisions() tt_csa() tt_elementary_school_districts() tt_estates() tt_linear_water() tt_metropolitan_divisions() tt_military() tt_new_england_cities() tt_new_england_city_divisions() tt_new_england_combined_areas() tt_places() tt_point_landmarks() tt_polygon_edges() tt_polygon_faces() tt_primary_roads() tt_primary_secondary_roads() tt_puma() tt_rails() tt_roads() tt_secondary_school_districts() tt_state_leg_lower() tt_state_leg_upper() tt_states() tt_subbarrios() tt_tracts() tt_tribal_block_groups() tt_tribal_subdivisions() tt_tribal_tracts() tt_uac() tt_unified_school_districts() tt_voting_districts() tt_zcta()

title: Lightweight Interface to TIGER/Line Shapefiles
text: tinytiger provide lightweight interface US Census Bureau’s TIGER/Line Shapefiles. four dependencies sf. Download caching supported; see details.

title: Lightweight Interface to TIGER/Line Shapefiles
text: Install tinytiger CRAN : can also install development version tinytiger:

title: Lightweight Interface to TIGER/Line Shapefiles
text: tinytiger provides lightweight functions download Census Bureau TIGER/Line Shapefiles. download geography, simply use function corresponding one supported geographies.

title: Lightweight Interface to TIGER/Line Shapefiles
text: tt_address_ranges(): Address Ranges tt_ai_an_nh_areas(): American Indian / Alaska Native / Native Hawaiian Areas tt_tribal_subdivisions(): Tribal Subdivisions tt_anrc(): Alaskan Native Regional Corporations tt_area_landmarks(): Area Landmarks tt_area_water(): Area Water tt_block_groups(): Block Groups tt_cbsa(): Core Based Statistical Areas tt_congressional_districts(): Congressional Districts tt_new_england_combined_areas(): Combined New England Towns Cities tt_coastline(): Coastline tt_consolidated_cities(): Consolidated Cities tt_counties(): Counties tt_county_subdivisions(): County Subdivisions tt_csa(): Combined Statistical Areas tt_polygon_edges(): Polygon Edges tt_elementary_school_districts(): Elementary School Districts (limited states) tt_estates(): Estates (Virgin Islands ) tt_polygon_faces(): Polygon Faces tt_linear_water(): Linear Water tt_metropolitan_divisions(): Metropolitan Divisions tt_military(): Military Installations tt_new_england_cities(): New England Cities Towns tt_new_england_city_divisions(): New England Cities Towns Divisions tt_places(): Census Places tt_point_landmarks(): Point Landmarks tt_primary_roads(): Primary Roads tt_primary_secondary_roads(): Primary Secondary Roads tt_puma(): Public Use Microdata Areas tt_rails(): Railroads tt_roads(): Roads tt_secondary_school_districts(): Secondary School Districts (limited states) tt_state_leg_lower(): Lower State Legislative Districts tt_state_leg_upper(): Upper State Legislative Districts tt_states(): States tt_subbarrios(): Subbarios (Puerto Rico ) tt_blocks(): Blocks tt_tribal_block_groups(): Tribal Block Groups tt_tracts(): Tracts tt_tribal_tracts(): Tribal Tracts tt_uac(): : Urban Areas tt_unified_school_districts(): Unified School Districts tt_voting_districts(): Voting Districts tt_zcta(): Zip Code Tabulation Areas

title: Lightweight Interface to TIGER/Line Shapefiles
text: default, downloading print status messages /progress bar. silent downloads, set options(tinytiger.curl_quiet = TRUE). Downloads go options(tinytiger.cache_dir) set. , rappdirs installed, options(tinytiger.use_cache = TRUE), downloads cached sessions rappdirs::user_cache_dir("tinytiger"). installed, options(tinytiger.use_cache = FALSE), cache temporary directory persist sessions. can check size cache clear tt_cache_size() tt_cache_clear().
